verses.verse: Put them in mind <S%G5279><s%> <S%G846><s%> to be subject <S%G5293><s%> to principalities <S%G746><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> powers, <S%G1849><s%> to obey magistrates, <S%G3980><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> ready <S%G2092><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> work, <S%G2041><s%>

To speak evil <S%G987><s%> of no man, <S%G3367><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> no brawlers, <S%G269><s%> but gentle, <S%G1933><s%> showing <S%G1731><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> meekness <S%G4236><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men. <S%G444><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> ourselves also <S%G2532><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> sometimes <S%G4218><s%> foolish, <S%G453><s%> disobedient, <S%G545><s%> deceived, <S%G4105><s%> serving <S%G1398><s%> divers <S%G4164><s%> lusts <S%G1939><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> pleasures, <S%G2237><s%> living <S%G1236><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> malice <S%G2549><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> envy, <S%G5355><s%> hateful, <S%G4767><s%> and hating <S%G3404><s%> one another. <S%G240><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> after <S%G3753><s%> that the <S%G3588><s%> kindness <S%G5544><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> love of God our Savior toward man <S%G5363><s%> <S%G2316><s%> <S%G2257><s%> <S%G4990><s%> appeared, <S%G2014><s%>

Not <S%G3756><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> of <S%G1722><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> have done, <S%G4160><s%> but <S%G235><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to his <S%G848><s%> mercy <S%G1656><s%> he saved <S%G4982><s%> us, <S%G2248><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the washing <S%G3067><s%> of regeneration, <S%G3824><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> renewing <S%G342><s%> of the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost; <S%G4151><s%>

Which <S%G3739><s%> he shed <S%G1632><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> abundantly <S%G4146><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Savior; <S%G4990><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> being justified <S%G1344><s%> by his <S%G1565><s%> grace, <S%G5485><s%> we should be made <S%G1096><s%> heirs <S%G2818><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the hope <S%G1680><s%> of eternal <S%G166><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>

This is a faithful <S%G4103><s%> saying, <S%G3056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> these things <S%G5130><s%> I will <S%G1014><s%> that thou <S%G4571><s%> affirm constantly, <S%G1226><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they which have believed <S%G4100><s%> in God <S%G2316><s%> might be careful <S%G5431><s%> to maintain <S%G4291><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> works. <S%G2041><s%> These things <S%G5023><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> profitable <S%G5624><s%> unto men. <S%G444><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> avoid <S%G4026><s%> foolish <S%G3474><s%> questions, <S%G2214><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> genealogies, <S%G1076><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> contentions, <S%G2054><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> strivings <S%G3163><s%> about the law; <S%G3544><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> they are <S%G1526><s%> unprofitable <S%G512><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> vain. <S%G3152><s%>
A man <S%G444><s%> that is a heretic <S%G141><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> the first <S%G3391><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> second <S%G1208><s%> admonition <S%G3559><s%> reject; <S%G3868><s%>
Knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he that is such <S%G5108><s%> is subverted, <S%G1612><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sinneth, <S%G264><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> condemned of himself. <S%G843><s%>

When <S%G3752><s%> I shall send <S%G3992><s%> Artemas <S%G734><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> thee, <S%G4571><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> Tychicus, <S%G5190><s%> be diligent <S%G4704><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Nicopolis: <S%G3533><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> I have determined <S%G2919><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> to winter. <S%G3914><s%>

Bring Zenas the lawyer and Apollos on their journey <S%G4311><s%> <S%G2211><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3544><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G625><s%> diligently, <S%G4709><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> nothing <S%G3367><s%> be wanting <S%G3007><s%> unto them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> let ours <S%G2251><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> learn <S%G3129><s%> to maintain <S%G4291><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> necessary <S%G316><s%> uses, <S%G5532><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they be <S%G5600><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> unfruitful. <S%G175><s%>

All <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> are with <S%G3326><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> salute <S%G782><s%> thee. <S%G4571><s%> Greet <S%G782><s%> them that love <S%G5368><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the faith. <S%G4102><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> be with <S%G3326><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> all. <S%G3956><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
